distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Full TMDB Movies Dataset 2024 (1M Movies) dataset

distribution.name: TMDB_movie_dataset_v11.csv
distribution.description: The TMDB Movie Database is a comprehensive dataset containing information about movies. It includes columns such as ID, Title, Average Vote, Vote Count, Status, Release Date, Revenue, Runtime, and various other attributes.

field.name: id
field.description: Unique identifier for each movie. (type: int)

field.name: title
field.description: Title of the movie. (type: str)

field.name: vote_average
field.description: Average vote or rating given by viewers. (type: float)

field.name: vote_count
field.description: Total count of votes received for the movie. (type: int)

field.name: status
field.description: The status of the movie (e.g., Released, Rumored, Post Production, etc.). (type: str)

field.name: release_date
field.description: Date when the movie was released. (type: str)

field.name: revenue
field.description: Total revenue generated by the movie. (type: int)

field.name: runtime
field.description: Duration of the movie in minutes. (type: int)

field.name: adult
field.description: Indicates if the movie is suitable only for adult audiences. (type: bool)

field.name: backdrop_path
field.description: URL of the backdrop image for the movie. (type: str)

field.name: budget
field.description: Budget allocated for the movie. (type: int)

field.name: homepage
field.description: Official homepage URL of the movie. (type: str)

field.name: imdb_id
field.description: IMDb ID of the movie. (type: str)

field.name: original_language
field.description: Original language in which the movie was produced. (type: str)

field.name: original_title
field.description: Original title of the movie. (type: str)

field.name: overview
field.description: Brief description or summary of the movie. (type: str)

field.name: popularity
field.description: Popularity score of the movie. (type: float)

field.name: poster_path
field.description: URL of the movie poster image. (type: str)

field.name: tagline
field.description: Catchphrase or memorable line associated with the movie. (type: str)

field.name: genres
field.description: List of genres the movie belongs to. (type: str)

field.name: production_companies
field.description: List of production companies involved in the movie. (type: str)

field.name: production_countries
field.description: List of countries involved in the movie production. (type: str)

field.name: spoken_languages
field.description: List of languages spoken in the movie. (type: str)

field.name: keywords
field.description: Keywords associated with the movie. Do `.split(", ")` to convert to a list. (type: str)

keywords: subject > science and technology > internet > online communities
subject > arts and entertainment > movies and tv shows
name: Full TMDB Movies Dataset 2024 (1M Movies)
description:
The TMDb (The Movie Database) is a comprehensive movie database that provides information about movies, including details like titles, ratings, release dates, revenue, genres, and much more. 

This dataset contains a collection of 1,000,000 movies from the TMDB database.

> Dataset is **updated daily**. If you find this dataset valuable, don't forget to hit the upvote button! 😊💝 

## Interesting Task Ideas:

1. Predict movie ratings based on features such as revenue, popularity, genre, and runtime.
2. Identify trends in movie release dates and analyze their impact on revenue.
3. Analyze the relationship between budget, revenue, and popularity to determine factors that contribute to a movie's success.
4. Build a recommendation system that suggests similar movies based on genres, production companies, and language.
5. Perform sentiment analysis on movie reviews to understand audience reactions.
6. Explore the impact of movie genres on popularity and revenue.
7. Investigate the correlation between runtime and audience engagement.
8. Identify successful production companies and analyze their strategies.
9. Utilize natural language processing techniques to extract meaningful insights from movie overviews.
10. Visualize movie popularity over time and identify popular genres in different periods.

---
